𒀜 𒁀𒉌𒅀
ᵛADᵃ ba-ni-ia Vadda baun-yo
Vadda born-I "The father wo installed me"

𒀊𒋾𒅅𒈠 bautiq.me 𓀨 √patāqu 𓊅 build cast

𓐪 𓂧 𓀨 #qd •kurdi @ court

𓐪 𓂧 𓀨 #qd •quδi kuši < կառուցել kaṙucʿel > 𒆪𒅆𒄩;𒆪𒋛𒅖;𒆪𒅆𒅅 kuši-; ku-ši-ha; ku-si-iš; ku-ši-ik "build"

𓐪 𓂧 𓀨 #qd •quδi kuši abbreviation for construi

𓐪 𓂧 𓀨 #qd •quδim οἰκοδομέω oikodoméō

𓐪 𓂧 𓀨 #qd clădi класти klasti ⇔ klóti klât Klotzen Kleistern klõdas “layer, stratum” clause
